description:
Falkon is a new KDE web browser, previously known as QupZilla. It aims to be a lightweight web browser available through all major platforms. This project has been originally started only for educational purposes. But from its start, Falkon has grown into a feature-rich browser. Falkon has all standard functions you expect from a web browser. It includes bookmarks, history (both also in sidebar) and tabs. Above that, it has by default enabled blocking ads with a built-in AdBlock plugin.

### Notes
- The software will get installed on "C:\Program Files\Falkon". The exe binary is falkon.exe. There is no Desktop icon, Start Menu entry, Names on Installing apps on Settings.
- The MSVisualCplusplus2013-redist dependency fixes the "MSVCR120.dll was not found" error when run the falkon.exe.
- This will not get uninstalled automatically by this package. Please, remove manually the installed folder after choco uninstall.
summary: A cross-platform lightweight browser built on the QtWebEngine engine.
author: David Rosca
